Package common

Class ClientServerMessage<T>

java.lang.Object
common.ClientServerMessage<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of data contained in the message
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientServerMessage<T> extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a message exchanged between client and server, containing data and a command.
